page.title: 08SCHOOL DAYS
page.content: inside. Mrs. Mithchell reads us a chapter of Wait Till Daytime. After that we go swimming for forty five minutes. When the forty five minutes are over we go back to school. Mrs. Mitchell gives out some letters and we collect our bags and go home. At home I go in and watch Children's ITV. Children's ITV is a series of children's programmes. It is from Mondays till Fridays and the times vary. The programme I always watch is called Danger Mouse. I like it because it is funny. When it has finished I go and look for my Dad. I see him cycling home with my brother (my brother is walking). I go up and meet them. When we get home Mum has the dinner ready. It is chips, fried eggs and sausage. We all like that dinner so there are no moans. After dinner I have an ice pop. When I have finished my ice pop
